text: Waypoint Presents is a gaming documentary TV show based on the website of the same name that was owned by VICE from October 19, 2016 to June 2, 2023. The show itself premiered on the D|XP block from August 16, 2017 to October 5, 2017, before being cancelled after 8 episodes due to declining ratings. == Synopsis == It is a documentary-styled gaming show, that talks about gaming, games, gaming communities, etc. Category:Television programs Category:2017 television series debuts Category:2017 television series endings Category:Documentary television series
title: Waypoint Presents
